title: Computational Chemistry
description: Introductory course in computational chemistry discussing electronic structure theory, semi-empirical methods, molecular mechanics, transition-state searching, and computation of thermodynamic quantities.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: CHEM 1212K Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CHEM 1310 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
